summary: Your spells and shouts are silent to others while this amulet is equipped.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#add8e6][b]What It Is[/b]

Creates a wearable amulet that behaves exactly like the
Quiet Casting Illusion magic perk.[/color]
[i]No more dumping four perks into Illusion magic when
you could be putting them all into fireball![/i]
 
[color=#ffff99][b]Where it Is[/b]

Inside the College of Winterhold is a hidden amulet.
Apparently it slipped off the Archmage's neck while he
was tending his garden. Its magic is yours for the taking...
if you can find it!

The necklace is a diamond necklace but otherwise visually
unremarkable and it is there, but like any piece of jewelry
it is easily misplaced. Not even the Archmage has been/was
able to find it! If you are not yet the Archmage, the item will
be flagged as stolen so be warned!
[/color]
[b]Optional Files[/b]

You may also download the disenchantable version. I would
consider this version of the mod a cheat and unbalanced for
classification purposes.

[color=#d3d3d3][b]Manual Installation[/b]

Extract the .esp and .bsa to your Steam>steamapps>common>Skyrim>Data folder.

[b]Manual Uninstallation[/b]

Remove the .esp and .bsa.[/color]

[color=#ffa07a][b]Bugs[/b]

[/color][list][color=#ffa07a]
[/color][*][color=#ffa07a]Report possible bugs via PM or comment.[/*][/color]
[/list][color=#cc99ff][b]Future Development[/b]

[/color][list][/list]
Also available on [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=208779932][color=#33ccff]Steam[/color][/url] and [url=http://afkmods.iguanadons.net/index.php?/files/file/1044-sorcerers-silence/][color=#33ccff]AFK Mods[/color][/url] and [url=http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/files/file/1645-sorcerers-silence/][color=#33ccff]TES Alliance[/color][/url].
This file was created using my [url=http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/topic/7243-modding-workshop-my-first-quest/]tutorial for quest creation[/url]!  Modders rejoice!
author: Sulhir

files.name: Sorcerers Silence
files.changelogHtml:
Now the necklace is disenchantable AND you can enchant circlets, rings, gloves, necklaces, and bracers with the learned effect.
Updated all versions to latest.

files.name: Disenchantable
files.changelogHtml:
Now the necklace is disenchantable AND you can enchant circlets, rings, gloves, necklaces, and bracers with the learned effect.
Updated all versions to latest.
